content:
What a wonderful coincidence! It's great that you're staying connected with your roots and culture. Hyderabad is a beautiful city, and I'm sure you must have had a great time catching up with your friends from back home.

Remember to also take some time to explore the US while you're visiting your aunt. The country has so much to offer, from its vibrant cities to its stunning natural beauty. And don't forget to try some of the amazing food options available!

Also, don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need any further assistance with your travel plans. I'm always here to help.

Safe travels, and I hope you have a fantastic time in the US!
